title: Git Cute
description: hosted by Jocelyn Harper, talking about general career advice for software engineers and random tech topics she finds interesting.

title: Ladybug Podcast
description: hosted by Emma Bostian, Sidney Buckner, Ali Spittel, and Kelly Vaughn, talking about all things concerning software development and being a woman in tech.

title: Tech Sisters Stories
description: hosted by Grace of Tech Sisters, a community supporting Muslim Women in Tech through storytelling, mentorship, and collaboration, focused on highlighting Muslim women who are rising stars within tech industries.

title: A Podcast by Pawlean
description: hosted by community builder, advocate, and engineer Pauline Narvas, talking about tech, careers, health, relationships, and other topics which matter to her.

title: Rocket
description: hosted by Simone de Rochefort, Christina Warren, and Brianna Wu, talking about tech, comics, films, games, books, and anything geek culture.

title: NonBinary Code
description: hosted by Kayden, a tech podcast made by and for LGBTQIA+ people exploring the intersections between tech news, mental health, and queer experiences.

title: The Good Robot
description: hosted by Eleanor Drage and Kerry Mackereth, a podcast produced by the University of Cambridge Centre for Gender Studies which examines whether 'good' tech is possible and what impact feminism can have upon technology.

title: Tech Don't Sleep
description: hosted by Barbie Evans, Edward Jones, and Bill McCleskey, talking about technology and the Black entrepreneur experience.
